title: Did Amazon’s Alexa Order Unwanted Dollhouses for a Little Girl and TV Viewers?
subtitle: Claims that Amazon's digital assistant went rogue, ordering dollhouses for a little girl and hundreds of TV viewers, are questionable.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Amazon's Alexa ordered an expensive dollhouse after a child asked the device to play with her, and a news report on the incident triggered several dozen more unwanted orders.
